hero.name: SOHAIB LAARICHI
hero.description: Final year Computer Engineering student (MIAGE option) at EMSI, specializing in network architecture, security, and systems administration. Skilled in Java, Spring Boot, Next.js, and Cisco technologies. Actively seeking an internship opportunity starting February 2026 to apply and develop my skills in designing and deploying network and software solutions.

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: Final year Computer Engineering student (MIAGE option) at EMSI, specializing in network infrastructure and cybersecurity. My goal is to contribute to innovative technological solutions while developing my skills in network security and systems administration. Actively seeking an internship starting February 2026.

formations.degree: BTS in IT Systems and Networks

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with

jobs.title: Summer Intern
jobs.description: End-to-end development of the Mkhademia platform - a comprehensive web platform for Moroccan freelancers. Full-stack architecture design and implementation with modern technologies.
achievements: Complete development of Mkhademia web platform using Node.js, Next.js and MongoDB
Designed and implemented MongoDB database architecture for freelance profile management
Created responsive user interface with Next.js 14 and modern design patterns
Integrated search and filtering features by Moroccan cities

jobs.title: IT Technician (Intern)
jobs.description: Technical support and IT infrastructure management in a commercial environment. Responsible for maintaining the IT fleet, server configuration, and incident resolution.
achievements: Configured and maintained 3 internal Windows Server 2019 servers
Diagnosed and repaired IT fleet of ~50 workstations
Resolved 80+ technical support tickets with direct user assistance
Documented maintenance procedures and created intervention guides

jobs.title: Technician Assistant (Intern)
jobs.description: Participated in critical network infrastructure projects in healthcare environment. Deployment of enterprise-level network solutions with Cisco equipment and fiber optic infrastructure.
achievements: Deployed structured cabling infrastructure and patched 12 network bays
Performed single-mode fiber optic splicing with reflectometry testing
Configured 8 Cisco switches (Layer 2): VLAN management, Port Security for new equipment integration
Participated in network deployment for 2 new medical departments

geobus.title: GeoBus - Bus Tracking System
geobus.description: A comprehensive bus tracking system for Marrakech, Morocco, consisting of a Spring Boot backend and Android mobile app. The system provides real-time bus tracking, nearest bus stop finder, and arrival time estimation to improve public transportation experience.
features: Real-time bus tracking on interactive maps
Nearest bus stop discovery based on user location
Walking time and bus arrival estimation
RESTful API with Spring Boot backend
MySQL database for bus stop and route data

mkhedmin.title: Mkhedmin.ma - Moroccan Freelance Platform
mkhedmin.description: A freelance platform specifically designed for the Moroccan market, offering localized features like Moroccan city filters, RTL support for Arabic, and WhatsApp integration. The platform connects freelancers and clients with advanced communication tools.

pharmalive.title: PharmaLive - Pharmacy Management
pharmalive.description: Comprehensive pharmacy management system developed in Java EE with Bootstrap interface. Manages inventory, prescriptions, sales and provides detailed analytics to optimize pharmaceutical operations.

callcenter.title: Call Center Desktop Application
callcenter.description: Call center application developed with JavaFX for modern UI components. Connected to MySQL database for customer management, call logging, and performance analytics.
features: Clean separation of concerns with business logic layer

reservation.title: Reservation Management System Swing
reservation.description: Reservation management system developed in Java Swing with object-oriented programming. Integrates calendar, automated confirmations and complete reservation management.
features: Clean OOP architecture with separation of responsibilities

network.title: Network Infrastructure Project
network.description: Complete network infrastructure design and implementation using Cisco equipment. VLAN configuration, routing protocols and network performance optimization.

cisco.title: Cisco ISE NAC Implementation
cisco.description: Complete Cisco Identity Services Engine network access control deployment. Identity management, policy enforcement and compliance monitoring.
